remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時的頁面巡覽區按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 頁面 」) 控制項內按一下時前,控制項負責的分頁作業。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 頁面巡覽區按鈕通常位於中的頁面巡覽區列控制項。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入委派給事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control.
